Please follow these instructions to enable Javascript. for sale resale $79,500 5 East Evergreen Avenue, Somerdale NJ 08083 Make a difference and start your business right here on this highly visible corner on the White Horse Pike in Somerdale just seconds from Lions Head plaza. This is clear land ready for you to make your dreams come true. Great location for a fast food restaurant, a trade shop, professional offices, dry cleaning, animal grooming facility,combined commericial/residential building, perhaps Ritas. These are just a few options of the permitted use. All approvals must go through the township. housing 39.85084 -75.02329 Home Facts Photos 4 Map&Nearby Mortgage Comparables Sales Trends Schools Photos of 5 East Evergreen Avenue, Somerdale NJ View large photos (4)
